law.catch_line: The managing official of a correctional facility shall present a copy of an inmate's case record mai...
law.text:
The managing official of a correctional facility shall present a copy of an inmate's case record maintained under § 3-601 of this subtitle, or a summary of the record, to the Maryland Parole Commission:
by the time the inmate becomes eligible for parole; and
at other times on request.
